TABLE.NAME: quiz_papercopy_batches
TABLE.COMMENT: List of batch-created paper copies of quizzes.

FIELD.NAME: quiz
FIELD.COMMENT: The quiz from which this batch was created.

FIELD.NAME: usages
FIELD.COMMENT: comma-separated list of usages created by this batch

FIELD.NAME: prerendered
FIELD.COMMENT: A Moodle pathnamehash identifying a prerendered copy of this batch, if one exists.

FIELD.NAME: prerendered_with_key
FIELD.COMMENT: Pathnamehash of a prerendered file which contains answer keys with each attempt.

FIELD.NAME: prerendered_key_only
FIELD.COMMENT: The pathnamehash of a prerendered batch which contains answer keys only.

FIELD.NAME: entrymode
FIELD.COMMENT: Specifies which entry mode the quizzes are optimized for
